posts.postText:
I want to cut back on unused server costs.
Therefore, I am deleting GMStranded and Jail.
Also I'm reducing flood to 15 slots, because it has been empty for like a week.
However, I am willing to get 1 more server, slots decided upon by me.
BUT, you need to suggest a gamemode here.
